org.apache.giraph.utils

类 CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.CollectionUtils

  • public class CollectionUtils
extends Object
    Helper methods for Collections

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      C      		 addConcurrent(K key, C values, ConcurrentMap<K,C> map)
      If map already has a value associated with the key it adds values to that value, otherwise it will put values to the map.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addConcurrent

        public static <K,V,C extends Collection<V>> C addConcurrent(K key,
                                            C values,
                                            ConcurrentMap<K,C> map)
        If map already has a value associated with the key it adds values to that value, otherwise it will put values to the map. Do not reuse values.
        类型参数:
        K - Key
        V - Value
        C - Collection
        参数:
        key - Key under which we are adding values
        values - Values we want to add
        map - Map which we are adding values to
        返回:
        New value associated with the key

      • isEqual

        public static <T> boolean isEqual(Iterable<T> first,
                  Iterable<T> second)
        Helper method to check if iterables are equal. Supports the case where the iterable next() returns a reused object. We do assume that iterator() produces the objects in the same order across repeated calls, if the object doesn't change. This is very expensive (n^2) and should be used for testing only.
        类型参数:
        T - Type to compare
        参数:
        first - First iterable
        second - Second iterable
        返回:
        True if equal, false otherwise
